findings.title: Lack of Fee Limits for V3 Transactions
findings.description: Starknet transactions have fields to specify the maximum amount of fees the sequencer may take, but v3 transactions lack fee limits.

findings.title: Newer Cairo Version Available
findings.description: The Cairo version used (2.4.0) has known bugs and newer versions are available, including 2.4.1 with bug fixes.

findings.title: Discrepancy Between Actual OUTSIDE_EXECUTION_TYPE_HASH and Comments
findings.description: Hardcoded value of OUTSIDE_EXECUTION_TYPE_HASH in outside_execution.cairo file does not match the hash derived from the comment above it, which may lead to inconsistencies.

findings.title: Self-Written Versions of get_execution_info and get_tx_info
findings.description: Functions that retrieve the execution and transaction information have been implemented in transaction_version.cairo, but the same functionality is provided by the starknet package.

findings.title: __validate_deploy__ Function Doesn’t Have Its Own Transaction Version Check
findings.description: The __validate_deploy__ function reuses the same transaction version check as the INVOKE transaction instead of having its own separate check for DEPLOY_ACCOUNT transactions, which can affect code maintainability.
